comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: At some point, yeah. There’s an open issue on github for this. (EDIT: also this one for backstories).

comments.author: Kay Hude.2910
comments.body:
Hi Devs,
Are there any plans to expose the contents of the Story Journal in the API? Things like Personality (chosen during character creation), Order (Durmand, Vigil, Whisperers), progression of personal story / LW2 / HoT, current storyline, … might be interesting.

Thanks,
Kay
